InformativeText.Abstract: The Battery Service exposes the state of a battery within a device.
InformativeText.Summary: The Battery Service exposes the Battery State and Battery Level of a single battery or set of batteries in a device.

Dependencies.Dependency: This service has no dependencies on other GATT-based services.

Requirement.__text: C1: Mandatory if the Battery Level characteristic properties supports notification, otherwise excluded.
C1: Mandatory if the Battery Level characteristic properties supports notification, otherwise excluded.

Characteristic.InformativeText:
The Battery Level characteristic is read using the GATT Read Characteristic Value sub-procedure and returns the current battery level as a percentage from 0% to 100%; 
                0% represents a battery that is fully discharged, 100% represents a battery that is fully charged.
